text: يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ أَرْضِى وَٰسِعَةٌ فَإِيَّـٰىَ فَٱعْبُدُونِ

translation.en.sahih: O My servants who have believed, indeed My earth is spacious, so worship only Me.
translation.id.indonesian: Hai hamba-hamba-Ku yang beriman, sesungguhnya bumi-Ku luas, maka sembahlah Aku saja.
